tool_description:
Introducing ask-ai - the friend all your friends already have! ask-ai is here to make all your mundane tasks easier and faster than ever. 
With instant, personalized responses to all your requests, ask-ai will make sure you never feel alone. 
Plus, ask-ai is fully equipped with some seriously hilarious one-liners- so get ready to laugh out loud! 🤖
name: ask-ai
title: ask-ai

api_list.name: Ask question to AI Service
api_list.description: Ask question to AI Service. Be concise.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ask-ai.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/ask-ai/What is Artificial Intelligence?"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ask-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ask-ai.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/ask-ai/{question}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ask-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
